metadata.name: RugCheck
metadata.description: Automated smart contract security scanner for Solana tokens. Detects rug pull risks, mint authority, freeze authority, and liquidity locks. Critical for ICM safety.
metadata.author: gICM

tools.name: scanToken
tools.description: Comprehensive security scan with risk score (0-100)

tools.name: checkMintAuthority
tools.description: Verify if mint authority is revoked (prevents unlimited minting)

tools.name: checkFreezeAuthority
tools.description: Verify if freeze authority is revoked (prevents wallet freezing)

tools.name: checkLiquidityLock
tools.description: Check if liquidity is locked and for how long

tools.name: getTopHolders
tools.description: Analyze holder distribution for concentration risk

tools.name: checkMetadata
tools.description: Verify token metadata and social links

tools.name: getRugScore
tools.description: Calculate overall rug risk score with detailed breakdown

tools.name: checkCreatorHistory
tools.description: Analyze token creator's previous launches (rug history)

tools.name: monitorContract
tools.description: Set up continuous monitoring for contract changes

pricing.note: Free tier has 5-second rate limit between requests

scoreInterpretation.0-20: Very Safe - Multiple audits, locked liquidity, revoked authorities
scoreInterpretation.41-60: Moderate Risk - Some red flags, proceed with caution
scoreInterpretation.81-100: Extreme Risk - Clear rug indicators, avoid
